moreBlocks.lawyersAtRicciLawFirm,P.A.SelectedForASu: • Ricci, Brian M. On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
With decades of combined experience, the attorneys at Ricci Law Firm, P.A., are able to deliver vigorous representation for personal injury and wrongful death victims in Greenville, North Carolina. In addition to brain and catastrophic injuries, we handle a wide array of cases involving:

  • Workers' Compensation
  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Big Truck Accidents
  • Motorcycle Accidents
  • Nursing home abuse
  • Premises liability
  • Products liability

We also take on issues specific to accidents on the job, including death benefits. Our attorneys work relentlessly to identify and seek the maximum possible reimbursement for clients' current and future pain and suffering.

In our history, our law firm has recovered tens of millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts. Because of this success, lead attorney Brian Ricci is a member of the prestigious Million Dollar Advocates Forum. Our lawyers have earned the highest possible rating of 10.0 on Avvo and inclusion in the Super Lawyers list. We are also among The National Trial Lawyers: Top 40 Under 40.

When we are not representing clients, we remain deeply engaged in the Greenville community. Our attorneys are actively involved in local events and organizations as volunteers, sponsors and donors. Ricci Law Firm, P.A., provides a free initial consultation and takes credit cards as payment for utmost convenience.
